sections.In the books: In ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'', the Mother of Mountains is a mountain sacred to the Dohtraki people, located within sight of Vaes Dothrak and a lake known as the Womb of the World, from which, according to myth, the first man emerged riding on the first horse. Only men are allowed to set foot on the Mother of Mountains.
sections.TOP: Mother of Mountains07093j2t6xqyf8uo7pia8phmd4vjg14oxp1t1786972015-03-22T21:04:15ZThe Dragon Demands5014364/* References */[[File:MotherOfMountains.jpg|thumb|400px]]The '''Mother of Mountains''' is a mountain in [[Essos]], located within sight of [[Vaes Dothrak]], a lone mountain in the middle of the plains of the [[Dothraki Sea]]. It is considered sacred in the [[Great Stallion|Dothraki religion]].
sections.History:
===[[Season 1]]===
During his vow to take the [[Iron Throne]] for his unborn son, [[Rhaego]], [[Khal]] [[Drogo]] swears by the Mother of Mountains.<ref>"[[You Win or You Die]]"</ref>
